reportfile.name: Activity History Report
reportfile.description: Show all SQLsecure activity history.

reportfile.name: All User Permissions Report
reportfile.description: Show all objects with permissions in databases for all servers.

reportfile.name: Audited SQL Servers Report
reportfile.description: Show all the SQL Server instances that are being audited by SQLsecure.

reportfile.name: Cross Server Login Check Report
reportfile.description: Show all SQL Servers where a selected user has access.

reportfile.name: Database Chaining Enabled Report
reportfile.description: Show all SQL Server instances that have cross-database ownership chaining enabled.

reportfile.name: Database Roles Report
reportfile.description: Show all direct members of Database Roles on all SQL Servers.

reportfile.name: Data Collection Filters Report
reportfile.description: Show the data collection filters for all SQL Server instances.

reportfile.name: Guest Enabled Databases Report
reportfile.description: Show all databases on a SQL Server instance where the Guest user has access.

reportfile.name: Login Vulnerability Report
reportfile.description: Show all SQL Server logins with weak passwords.

reportfile.name: Mail Vulnerability Report
reportfile.description: Show all SQL Server instances with SQL Mail stored procedures.

reportfile.name: Mixed Mode Authentication Report
reportfile.description: Show all SQL Server instances where Windows Authentication is not the only login method.

reportfile.name: OS Vulnerability Report
reportfile.description: Show all extended stored procedures that allow access to operating system features that could compromise system security.

reportfile.name: Risk Assessment Report
reportfile.description: Show all policy and risk assessment results.

reportfile.name: Assessment Comparison Report
reportfile.description: Compare two assessments.

reportfile.name: Snapshot Comparison Report
reportfile.description: Compare two snapshots.

reportfile.name: Server Logins and User Mappings Report
reportfile.description: Show all Server Logins and associated Database User Mappings for each SQL Server instance being audited.

reportfile.name: Server Roles Report
reportfile.description: Show all direct members of Server Roles on all SQL Servers.

reportfile.name: Servers with Dangerous Windows Groups Report
reportfile.description: Show all SQL Server instances that grant access to any OS controlled Windows Group.

reportfile.name: Suspect Windows Accounts Report
reportfile.description: Show all the unresolved Windows Accounts that have Server Logins.

reportfile.name: System Administrator Vulnerability Report
reportfile.description: Show all SQL Server instances that include Built-in Administrators as members of the sysadmin role.

reportfile.name: SQLsecure Users Report
reportfile.description: Show all SQLsecure users.

reportfile.name: User Permissions
reportfile.description: Shows all user permissions. WARNING: This report can run for many minutes!

reportfile.name: Vulnerable Fixed Roles Report
reportfile.description: Show all SQL Server instances that contain fixed roles assigned to public or guest.

reportfile.name: SubReport_Logins
reportfile.description: Internal Use Only: Sub-report showing logins.

reportfile.name: SubReport_ServersUsedSummary
reportfile.description: Internal Use Only: Sub-report showing snapshots used to generate the parent report.

reportfile.name: SubReport_UsersPermissions
reportfile.description: Internal Use Only: Sub report showing object permissions.
